help.title: File Recovery Tool - Help
help.param.name: Generic text parameter (drive letter, filename, pattern, etc.)
help.cmd.listdeleted: List all deleted files on a drive
help.cmd.searchdeleted: Search for deleted files by name pattern
help.cmd.restorebyrecord: Restore a deleted file by its MFT record number
help.cmd.detectoverwrite: Detect if deleted file data has been overwritten
help.cmd.diagnosemft: Diagnose MFT (Master File Table) health and structure
help.tip1: Use 'help <command>' for detailed help on a specific command
help.tip3: Filter levels balance performance vs completeness:
help.tip3b: - Use 'none' to see all file paths (slower)
help.tip3c: - Use 'exclude' for fastest scan (system files hidden)
help.tip5: Cached results speed up repeated searches (60 min validity)
listdeleted.desc: Scans the Master File Table (MFT) to list all deleted files on the specified drive. Results are cached for 60 minutes.
listdeleted.filter.none: Show all files with full paths (slowest)
listdeleted.filter.skip: Skip path rebuild for system files (balanced)
searchdeleted.desc: Search for deleted files by filename pattern and/or extension. Uses cached results from previous scans for fast searching.
searchdeleted.param.pattern: Required: Filename pattern (* = wildcard for all)
setlang.invalid: Invalid language code. Use 'setlang' without arguments to see available languages.
scan.cache_saved: Cache saved successfully. Use 'searchdeleted' for fast searching.
